test_cases.title: Admin Dashboard Access Control (Role-Based)
test_cases.description: Verify role-based access permissions work correctly.
test_cases.preconditions: User accounts with different roles exist
test_steps: Login as CUSTOMER role and try to access /admin/dashboard URL
Login as VENDOR role and try to access /admin/dashboard
Login as ADMIN role and access both /admin/dashboard and /vendor/dashboard
test_cases.expected_result: Check that API endpoints also enforce same permissions.

test_cases.title: SQL Injection Prevention in Search
test_cases.description: Security testing for SQL injection vulnerabilities in product search.
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the product search page
test_steps: Enter malicious input in search box: ' OR '1'='1
Enter another malicious input: '; DROP TABLE products;--
test_cases.expected_result: System should treat these as literal search strings and NOT execute as SQL commands.

test_cases.title: Payment Processing - Valid Credit Card
test_cases.description: Test the checkout flow with Stripe test card.
test_cases.preconditions: User logged in, items in cart (total $45.99)
test_cases.expected_result: Payment should process in under 3 seconds. User gets confirmation email and order appears in Order History with status 'Processing'. Stripe dashboard should show transaction.

test_cases.title: Login Attempt with Invalid Password
test_cases.description: Check system handles wrong password correctly.
test_cases.preconditions: User account exists in the system
test_cases.expected_result: System should show error message 'Invalid credentials' and NOT allow access. Account should not be locked after first failed attempt but track the attempt.

test_cases.title: User Login with Valid Credentials
test_cases.description: Verify user can login using correct email and password
test_cases.preconditions: User account exists in the system
test_cases.expected_result: User should be redirected to dashboard, welcome message displayed

test_cases.title: Payment Failure - Declined Card
test_cases.description: Use Stripe test card (declined card) and check error handling.
test_cases.preconditions: User logged in, items in cart
test_cases.expected_result: Payment should be DECLINED. Check error message shows 'Your card was declined'. Cart should still have items, user should be able to try different payment method. No order should be created in database. No confirmation email sent. User account balance unchanged.

test_cases.title: Error Handling - Network Timeout During Payment
test_cases.description: Simulate network failure during payment processing.
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has items in cart
test_cases.expected_result: System should show user-friendly error message and NOT charge customer multiple times if they retry.

test_cases.title: Password Reset with Email Verification
test_cases.description: User forgot password and needs to reset it.
test_cases.preconditions: User account exists in the system
test_steps: Check that system sends reset email
Enter new password (min 8 chars with 1 uppercase, 1 number, 1 special char)
test_cases.expected_result: User should be able to login with NEW password and OLD password should not work anymore.

test_cases.title: Mobile Responsiveness - Checkout Flow on iPhone
test_cases.description: Test complete checkout on mobile device (iPhone 13, iOS 16, Safari).
test_cases.expected_result: All steps should work and UI should be responsive.

test_cases.title: Shopping Cart - Add Multiple Items and Update Quantity
test_cases.description: Test adding multiple items and updating quantity in shopping cart.
test_cases.expected_result: Cart should show correct total and persist if user logs out and logs back in.

test_cases.title: Performance - Product Listing Page Load Time
test_cases.description: Test page load performance for product catalog.
test_steps: Measure page load time using browser DevTools Network tab
test_cases.expected_result: Page should load completely in under 2 seconds on good internet connection and be usable in under 5 seconds on 3G.

test_cases.title: Checkout with Empty Cart (Edge Case)
test_cases.description: Test edge case where user tries to access checkout URL directly without items in cart.
test_cases.expected_result: System should detect empty cart and redirect to cart page with message 'Your cart is empty. Please add items before checkout.'
